summary: This module implements a neuralâ€‘network based ensemble backend for ANNIF. It stores training samples in an LMDB database, provides a Keras sequence wrapper for efficient data loading, defines a custom layer that averages tensors, and orchestrates the construction, training, and prediction of multiple neural network models whose outputs are combined to produce unified suggestion results.
business_intent: To improve automatic subject indexing or recommendation quality by leveraging the collective strengths of several neural network models, enabling more accurate and robust predictions across different projects.
